column4: firestarter is NOT a firewall, but a gui to ubuntus built in firewall...right?
Firestarter lets you edit what is already a firewalled configuration pretty much
You need GNU to make this app?
i am possibly an idiot....it says "you need to use GNU make"
but when i use make, it throws a fit
ah, do you have build-essential installed?
Have you got all the dependencies installed?
im at that stage where im trying to get used to building programs myself, but still sort of confused
ah, thats ok... it's a simple process once you get the hang of it, especially with ubuntu's awesome repos
Hm... have you looked in the readme for any?
ill check again....do i need gcc?
yes, but it's included in the build-essential metapackage
